description.narrative: The Tonga International Procurement Implementation initiative aims to increase the use of partner government systems to administer aid funds and tasking partner governments with carrying out procurement through their own national procurement systems. Funding will support the engagement of a technical adviser to work within Government of Tonga's procurement unit providing in country services, ensuring procurement complies with the CPG while building procurement capacity within GoT. This initiative aims at strengthening partner government procurement system while at the same time assist improve partner government system. The total value of this initiative is $0.4 million over 2 years, starting 2009-10.
